bufferedAmount.text: Returns the number of bytes of data that have been queued using calls to send() but not yet transmitted to the network.

close.text: Closes the WebSocket connection or connection attempt, if any.

connect.text: Initiate connect to the provided url

send.text: Method enqueues the specified data to be transmitted to the server over the WebSocket connection.

url.text: The URL to which to connect; this should be the URL to which the WebSocket server will respond.  The url needs to start with either 'ws://' or 'wss://'

closed.text: Emitted when the socket was closed, the event has at least the following three members code, reason and wasClean

error.text: Emitted when an error occurs on the WebSocket.

message.text: Emitted when a message is received from the server.

opened.text: Emitted when the state changes to 1 (Open); this indicates that the connection is ready to send and receive data.

name: controls.web.websocket.WebSocketClient
text: Wrapper for a WebSocket  The comments are copied or inspired by https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WebSocket
